text:
Hi!

I am testing out the API endpoints through the HubSpot Developers page, but the endpoints return 404?

For instance, requesting the subscription status fails:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/marketing-api/subscriptions-preferences>

(The access token is redacted here, but I made sure to set it in my request)
```curl --request GET \
  --url <https://api.hubapi.com/communication-preferences/v3/status/email/> \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN'```
Oh, ignore my request. I did forget to supply the email for the request ... THanks!

Hi Team,

Hope you are doing well.

My Requirement is 3rd party Sparrow Widget Integration with HubSpot CRM.

Integrating a third-party Sparrow widget into HubSpot CRM and how to add our Sparrow widget as a package in the HubSpot CRM Market Place,
OR for communication I need to achieve these below 3 use cases:


1. Whenever a call comes in the widget, as soon as the call connects, we need to pop up the customer details in the HubSpot CRM:


2. Click to call from the HubSpot CRM. If we click on the phone number in the HubSpot CRM, it needs to be dialed from the Sparrow widget:


3. After the call is completed when the disposition is submitted in the Sparrow widget that disposition needs to be passed to the HubSpot CRM.


Let me know for all the use cases what steps I need to Complete or if you have any Documentations for that Please share with me.

Regards,
Faraz Abbas

Hi , does anyone know how to retrieve the user id of the contributor associated to each goal from the goals api in HubSpot? The documentation only mentions the hs_created_by_user_id which is not what we need.  Would be great to hear if anyone knows about a work around. Link to the documentation: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/goals>. Thank you.

Hi, is there a way to get the messenger configuration? I have connected these channels to the inbox, and I’m able to get the channel account configuration using the Conversations API. But there is no info about the page ID, or page name
<@U01QVR44MEY> You'd be a lifesaver. Thank you!

Hello!
I'm unable to update the lifecyclestage value to a previous value using the API. We have a custom value labeled "Churned" and if I want to reactivate a contact by setting the lifecyclestage to "customer", the update is ignored.
No error message or anything.
Thanks for the help!

I would be really interest in testing the v3 of Workflows API that is under construction. <@UD53A9UUR> do you know if you are looking for alpha tester?

Thanks
just asked and they are not accepting new testers, but the wait is soon to be over :grin:

Hey all, our devs are running into an issue with a custom integration we have using HubSpot API, we're seeing email addresses send strangely recently. We are receiving values like this -  "email": "<mailto:example@gmail.com|example@gmail.com>>example@gmail.com",

Is HubSpot now sending this ">" notation to denote a contact email was on its way to be updated?

Hey folks. At HG Insights we are working in a integration with HubSpot and we faced some issue that we didn't find the answers in the docs. How can I clean a property value using the Import API? I've tried "", " ", "#N/A", null and none of them worked. Could some help me?
The Companies update API accepts `""` in order to clean the value, but, the Import API doesn't accept it at least

Hey Everyone - I'm trying to sort out these fields ... any ideas what they align to?

```PROPERTY_HS_DATE_ENTERED_933560
PROPERTY_HS_DATE_ENTERED_E_6_E_6_EA_9_C_C_2_F_9_4_A_94_87_AC_1_ED_024_AC_101_A_692659233
PROPERTY_HS_DATE_ENTERED_E_0502_BF_5_4636_4_FE_7_BA_62_7_DF_762_A_231_DD_112197660
PROPERTY_HS_DATE_ENTERED_85780787
PROPERTY_HS_V_2_DATE_ENTERED_E_6_E_6_EA_9_C_C_2_F_9_4_A_94_87_AC_1_ED_024_AC_101_A_692659233```
